name: chollo
description: - Use postman apis only named "... aws".

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run watch" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install: cd backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i && npm run build
scripts.startv: export NODE_ENV=production && cd backend && npm start
scripts.push-code: git pull origin main && git push origin main
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd dist && git add . && git commit -am 'Updated' && git pull origin main && git push origin main
